means: [军]（向占领地人民征收的）军税

sentence.Network_en: to make a contribution to charity
Her contribution to the research went largely unacknowledged.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对这项研究的贡献大都被忽略了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大英语B级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... contribute v. 捐助,贡献 contribution n. 捐献,贡献 control n./v. 控制,支配,管理.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting a tax or levy): from late Latin contributio(n-), from Latin contribuere 'bring together, add' (see contribute)

entry.def: If you make a contribution to something, you do something to help make it successful or to produce it.

example.ex: American economists have made important contributions to the field of financial and corporate economics...
example.tran: 美国的经济学家们在金融和企业经济学领域做出了重要的贡献。

example.ex: He was awarded a prize for his contribution to world peace.
example.tran: 他由于为世界和平做出贡献而获奖。

entry.def: A contribution is a sum of money that you give in order to help pay for something.

example.ex: This list ranked companies that make charitable contributions of a half million dollars or more.
example.tran: 这张名单列出了慈善捐款额达50万美元以上的公司。

entry.def: A contribution to a magazine, newspaper, or book is something that you write to be published in it.

means.word_mean: 1. any one of a number of individual efforts in a common endeavor;

sentences.sentence: "I am proud of my contribution to the team's success"
"they all did their share of the work"

means.word_mean: 2. a voluntary gift (as of money or service or ideas) made to some worthwhile cause
3. act of giving in common with others for a common purpose especially to a charity

sentences.sentence: "he expected his contribution to be repaid with interest"

means.word_mean: 5. a writing for publication especially one of a collection of writings as an article or story

auth_sentence.content: British racing should be tremendously proud of their contribution.
auth_sentence.res_content: British racing should be tremendously proud of their contribution.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: British racing should be tremendously proud of their contribution.

auth_sentence.content: His term and contribution at Somerset speaks for itself.

stems_affixes.word_buile: contributor[n.捐款人,贡献者,投稿者]+y……的→adj.贡献的, 捐助的
tribut给予+ary表形容词或名词→给予东西→进贡的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 贡品;颂词,称赞,[表示敬意的]礼物
stems_affixes.word_buile: tribut给予+e→n.贡品;颂词,称赞,[表示敬意的]礼物
at加强动作+tribut给予+e→[把原因]给出→归因于
attribute[v.[to]归因于,归属于 n.属性,品质,特征]+ion表名词→n.归因

stems_affixes.value_cn: 捐献, 贡献, 投稿
stems_affixes.word_buile: contribute[v.[to]贡献,捐助,捐献;投稿]+ion表名词→contribution捐献, 贡献
contribute[v.[to]贡献,捐助,捐献;投稿]+or人→n.捐款人,贡献者,投稿者
distribute[v.分发;分配;分布;配[电];[over]散布]+ion表名词→n.分发,分配;分布
re回+tribut给予+ion表名词→给回去→报复,报酬
at加强动作+tribut给予+e→[把原因]给出→归因于
con全部+tribut给予+e→全部给出→捐钱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 分发;分配;分布;配[电];[over]散布

Sentence.sentence: Wild places need encouraging for this reason, no matter how small their contribution.
What contribution can industrial scientists make when they come to teach in a university
Behavioral genetics has made important contributions to the biological revolution, providing information about the extent to which biology influences mind, brain and behavior.
One photo showed him at an award ceremony, where he had been honored for his financial contribution to a local baseball team.
To show his family's contribution to the community
Give his contribution some time later.

sentences.en: This is Chekhov's contribution to Russian literature.
sentences.cn: 这是契诃夫对俄罗斯文学的贡献。

sentences.en: All contributions, however small, will be greatly appreciated.
sentences.cn: 所有捐献, 不论数量多少, 我们都将非常感谢。

jushi.english: All contributions, however small, will be greatly appreciated.
jushi.chinese: 所有捐献,不论数量多少,我们都将非常感谢。

jushi.english: This is Chekhov's contribution to Russian literature.
jushi.chinese: 这是契诃夫对俄罗斯文学的贡献。

jushi.english: I enclosed a humble contribution towards the funds of your society.
jushi.chinese: 我谨为贵会的基金奉上一笔微薄的捐款。
